A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a great movie. Of course I had a lot of things in my mind that I thought would play out differently. However\, it was a great movie. I loved the fight scene with Rey and Kylo teaming up. Didn't like the Mary Poppins moment or Luke's death. I am okay that Luke dies\, however\, if you were going to kill him off\, why not let it happen in an actual battle. Other than that\, I liked the movie.
